response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be an asset to you. Considering its worth to us and the potential it holds for you, I propose a price of $11,000 for this exclusive item. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 11000}
